scripts.aws-sso-login:
aws sso login --profile $npm_config_profile && yawsso -p $npm_config_profile || npm run sso-fallback-message && echo '
AWS Credentials:
====================================' && echo export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=$(aws configure get aws_access_key_id --profile $npm_config_profile) && echo export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=$(aws configure get aws_secret_access_key --profile $npm_config_profile) && echo export AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=$(aws configure get aws_session_token --profile $npm_config_profile) && echo '===================================='
scripts.aws-sso-login:all: npm run aws-sso-login:dev && npm run aws-sso-login:sandbox && npm run aws-sso-login:prod
scripts.build: npm run openapi:build && npm run cdktf:init && node scripts/esbuild.js
scripts.sso-fallback-message:
echo 'Clear the cookies manually of START_URL i.e. https://d-9a6713bec9.awsapps.com/start#/ and try again. 
OR
Follow the steps mentioned below:
1. Open the START_URL i.e. https://d-9a6713bec9.awsapps.com/start#/ in a browser.
2. Click on the AWS Account Button you see
3. Click DevsAtFlagright
4. Click AWSAdministratorAccess | Command Line or Programmatic Access
5. Click Copy to Clipboard in Option 1
6. Paste the copied value in the terminal and press enter

Now you should be able to run the command again' && exit 1
scripts.synth:ci: export INFRA_CI=true; export ENV=local && cdk synth --quiet local-tarpon && npm run cdktf:init
scripts.synth:local: export ENV=local && npm run openapi:augment && cdk synth --quiet local-tarpon && npm run cdktf:init
scripts.synth:dev: export ENV=dev && npm run openapi:augment && cdk synth --quiet dev-tarpon && npm run cdktf:init
scripts.synth:dev:user: export ENV=dev:user && npm run openapi:augment && cdk synth --quiet dev-tarpon-$QA_SUBDOMAIN
scripts.synth:sandbox: export ENV=sandbox && npm run openapi:augment && cdk synth --quiet sandbox-tarpon
scripts.synth:prod:asia-1: export ENV=prod:asia-1 && npm run openapi:augment && cdk synth --quiet prod-tarpon
scripts.synth:prod:asia-2: export ENV=prod:asia-2 && npm run openapi:augment && cdk synth --quiet prod-tarpon
scripts.synth:prod:eu-1: export ENV=prod:eu-1 && npm run openapi:augment && cdk synth --quiet prod-tarpon
scripts.synth:prod:eu-2: export ENV=prod:eu-2 && npm run openapi:augment && cdk synth --quiet prod-tarpon
scripts.synth:prod:us-1: export ENV=prod:us-1 && npm run openapi:augment && cdk synth --quiet prod-tarpon
scripts.deploy:dev: export ENV=dev && cdk deploy dev-tarpon --require-approval=never && npm run cdktf:init && cdktf deploy --quiet dev-tarpon --auto-approve
scripts.deploy:dev:clean: npm run clear && npm install && ENV=dev npm run build && npm run synth:dev && npm run deploy:dev
scripts.deploy:qa: export QA_SUBDOMAIN=${QA_SUBDOMAIN:-qa$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD | shasum | head -c5)} && npm run clear && npm install && ENV=dev npm run build && npm run synth:dev:user && ENV=dev:user cdk deploy dev-tarpon-$QA_SUBDOMAIN --require-approval never
scripts.destroy:qa: npm run clear && npm install && ENV=dev npm run build && ENV=dev npm run openapi:augment && ENV=dev:user cdk destroy dev-tarpon-$QA_SUBDOMAIN --require-approval never -f
scripts.deploy:sandbox: ENV=sandbox cdk deploy sandbox-tarpon --require-approval=never && npm run cdktf:init && cdktf deploy --quiet sandbox-tarpon --auto-approve
scripts.deploy:sandbox:clean: npm run clear && npm install && npm run build && npm run synth:sandbox && npm run deploy:sandbox
scripts.deploy:prod:asia-1:clean: npm run clear && npm install && npm run build && npm run synth:prod:asia-1 && npm run deploy:prod:asia-1
scripts.deploy:prod:asia-2:clean: npm run clear && npm install && npm run build && npm run synth:prod:asia-2 && npm run deploy:prod:asia-2
scripts.deploy:prod:eu-1: ENV=prod:eu-1 cdk deploy prod-tarpon  --require-approval=never && npm run cdktf:init && cdktf deploy --quiet prod-tarpon --auto-approve
scripts.deploy:prod:eu-1:clean: npm run clear && npm install && npm run build && npm run synth:prod:eu-1 && npm run deploy:prod:eu-1
scripts.deploy:prod:eu-2:clean: npm run clear && npm install && npm run build && npm run synth:prod:eu-2 && npm run deploy:prod:eu-2
scripts.deploy:prod:us-1:clean: npm run clear && npm install && npm run build && npm run synth:prod:us-1 && npm run deploy:prod:us-1
scripts.deploy:pipeline:clean: export ENV=deploy && npm run aws-sso-login:deploy && npm run synth:pipeline && npm run deploy:pipeline
scripts.deploy:pipeline-test:clean: export ENV=deploy-test && npm run aws-sso-login:deploy && npm run synth:pipeline && npm run deploy:pipeline
scripts.start-local-api: npm run openapi:augment && ENV=local ts-node-dev --transpile-only --inspect=4321 -r tsconfig-paths/register local-api-server.ts --exit-child
scripts.recreate-local-ddb: npm run delete-local-ddb --table=$npm_config_table; npm run create-local-ddb --table=$npm_config_table
scripts.create-local-ddb: aws dynamodb create-table --endpoint-url http://localhost:8000 --table-name $npm_config_table --attribute-definitions AttributeName=PartitionKeyID,AttributeType=S AttributeName=SortKeyID,AttributeType=S --key-schema AttributeName=PartitionKeyID,KeyType=HASH AttributeName=SortKeyID,KeyType=RANGE --provisioned-throughput ReadCapacityUnits=1,WriteCapacityUnits=1 --region=us-east-2
scripts.dev: ENV=local npm run parallel dev:databases dev:api
